client_description.Summary Note:
Weber Koch Herrmann and the RM met at a networking event in Berlin. They quickly realized they had complementary skills and decided to collaborate on several projects.
Weber Koch Herrmann is a 24 year old and comes from Germany.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
client_description.Family Background: Weber Koch Herrmann is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description.Education Background:
In 2019, Weber graduated from Pestalozzi-Gymnasium Nürnberg with a secondary school diploma.
Weber graduated from RWTH Aachen University in 2025, completing his higher education.
client_description.Occupation History:
Weber Koch Herrmann is a 24 year old and comes from Germany.
Weber Koch Herrmann did not start his professional career yet.
client_description.Wealth Summary:
He did not have any savings to invest in financial markets.
Client does not have any properties.In 2018, he received an inheritance of 2740000 EUR from his late grandmother, who was a prominent Hedge Fund Manager, and has since invested it in various assets.
client_description.Client Summary: The RM is committed to helping Weber achieve financial success and security as he embarks on his professional journey.
